entry.title: Ukrainian Forces in Mariupol Rebuff Russian Ultimatum to Surrender
entry.content: Russia is on the verge of capturing the city. Zelensky warned that “elimination” of surrounded troops would endanger peace talks.

entry.title: Now in Dubai: Passover Celebrations
entry.content: Jews have established the first new congregations in an Arab nation since the establishment of Israel in 1948.

entry.title: Russia and Ukraine Build Forces for Looming Battles in East
entry.content: The two countries’ militaries will be operating on open terrain well-suited for massed forces unlike earlier skirmishing around Kyiv.

entry.title: Inside a Shanghai Quarantine Center: No Showers, Lights On 24/7
entry.content: Almost three weeks of forced isolation after a positive Covid-19 test made Jane Polubotko, a Ukrainian, feel like a “Covid criminal.”
